body:
## Expected Behavior
If a client sends an update request to a workflow, but the workflow completes before the update is complete the client is notified with a failure.

## Actual Behavior
If a client sends an update request to a workflow, but the workflow completes before the update is complete the client hangs.

comments.body: The same logic should also apply to terminated workflows ie pending update request sent to a terminated workflow should return some error.

title: If a workflow completes with not complete updates the server should fail those updates and notify the caller
